Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Nahim, maim sahu khanda ham isa sahira (maka) di
Ate tusim isa vica vasade ho
Ate sahu hai pita (adama) ate usa di aulada di
Asim manukha nu mihanata ate musakalam (vica rahina la'i?) Bana'i'a hai
Ki uha samajhada hai ki usa te kise da zora nahim
Akhada hai ki maim bahuta sara mala kharaca kara dita
Ki uha samajhada hai ki kise ne usa nu nahim dekhi'a
Ki asim unham nu do akham nahim diti'am
ika jibha ate do bul
Ate asim unham nu do raha dasa dite
Phira uha ghati te nahim carhi'a
Tusim ki samajho ki iha ghati ki hai
(Gulami tom) kise di garadana nu chada'una
Jam bhukhe nu bhojana khava'una
Anatha risatedara nu
Jam miti vica rule besahara nu
Phira uha unham lokam vicom hove, jihara imana li'ave ate ika-duje nu dhiraja ate hamadaradi di nasihata kiti
Iha loka hi bhagam vale hana
Ate jihare a'itam tom inakara karana vale hana, uha bada-kisamata hana
Unham te aga cha'i ho'i hovegi
